members.comment: Constructs a new ConnectException with the specified detail message as to why the connect error occurred. A detail message is a String that gives a specific description of this error.
Construct a new ConnectException with no detailed message.

name: java.net.ConnectException
comment: Signals that an error occurred while attempting to connect a socket to a remote address and port. Typically, the connection was refused remotely (e.g., no process is listening on the remote address/port).
